subject: Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
Football (College)
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The settlements in the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse case have been unfolding since mid-August, but Penn State waited until Monday to announce them all at once.
snippet: The settlements in the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse case have been unfolding since mid-August, but Penn State waited until Monday to announce them all at once.
